title: 29_01_08_LP_LIVE_LONDON
description:
London, England
O2 Arena
29th January 2008

Setlist:
01. No More Sorrow
02. Don&#039;t Stay
03. Somewhere I Belong
04. Wake
05. Given Up
06. Lying From You
07. Papercut
08. Points Of Authority
09. Leave Out All The Rest
10. Numb
11. The Little Things Give You Away
12. Shadow Of The Day
13. Breaking The Habit
14. Valentine&#039;s Day
15. Crawling
16. In The End
17. Bleed It Out
18. In Between
19. What I&#039;ve Done
20. One Step Closer
21. Faint

Show Notes:
- &#039;Petrified&#039; verse 1 was over &#039;Points Of Authority&#039;.
- The first encore, which was supposed to be &#039;What I&#039;ve Done&#039; followed by &#039;Pushing Me Away (Piano Version)&#039; was replaced by &#039;In Between&#039; followed by &#039;What I&#039;ve Done&#039;.
- When the band started &#039;Bleed It Out&#039; the crowd at the front started singing the chorus, so Chester joined in and they did a full chorus before the first verse.
- The official name for this setlist is Set R, not Set B like we thought it was. &#039;Wilderness&#039; was given the setlist following the show and can confirm that it says Set R on it. On the actual setlist, the band put tape over the first encore and wrote the two new songs for the first encore on it.

thx to lplive.net for the info ;)
